item.title: Trump says he will join police, military on D.C. streets Thursday
item.description: The move continues his administration’s efforts to exert control over the capital city.

item.title: Harris to embark on tour to promote memoir about presidential campaign
item.description: The 15-city book tour will be Harris’s first series of planned public appearances around the country since she lost the election in November.

item.title: California passes first of three bills to counter Texas in nationwide fight over election maps
item.description: California races toward redrawing congressional maps as Texas moves toward final approval of its plans.

item.title: Eric Adams adviser suspended after giving reporter cash in potato chip bag
item.description: Katie Honan, a reporter for the City, said that Winnie Greco, a volunteer for Adams’s reelection campaign, apologized and told her the gesture was cul...

item.title: Do Democrats have a version of Project 2025? Karen Tumulty took your questions.
item.description: Our chief political correspondent chats with readers every other Thursday at 12 p.m. Eastern time.
